meanings.definition: Not involving or related to teaching.
meanings.sent1: The nonteaching staff at the school includes the janitors and cafeteria workers.
meanings.sent2: The art class was a nonteaching activity, focusing on creativity rather than instruction.
meanings.sent3: The nonteaching role of the clown at the party was to entertain the children with jokes and tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her nonteaching approach to problem-solving involved thinking outside the box.
meanings.sent5: The nonteaching nature of the event allowed everyone to relax and have fun without any educational pressure.

meanings.sent1: The nonteaching materials in the library were novels and magazines for leisure reading.
meanings.sent2: The playground was a nonteaching space where children could play freely without structured lessons.
meanings.sent3: The nonteaching aspect of the game was simply to have fun and enjoy the competition.
meanings.sent4: His nonteaching style of leadership encouraged independent thinking and problem-solving.
meanings.sent5: The nonteaching environment of the park allowed visitors to unwind and connect with nature.
